entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:21 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 02:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -26.1°C
Wind: E 81 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:24 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:24 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the evening and after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:24 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
